mapper.select:
select p.* from project p
left join project_register pr on pr.project_id = p.id
where 1=1
and Now() >= p.enroll_end_date and (p.state=1 or p.state=2)
and pr.member_id = #{memberId} and pr.state=1
and (p.review_progress is not null and p.review_progress>0)
order by p.update_date desc

select p.id, p.is_pass, p.project_name, p.bid_opening_time, p.enroll_end_date, case (SELECT max(review_type) FROM evaluation_criteria ec WHERE p.id = ec.project_id and ec.member_id=#{memberId}) when 1 then 30 when 2 then 60 when 3 then 100 else 0 end as review_progress from project p left join review_info ri on ri.project_id=p.id left join win_bid wb on ri.id=wb.win_bid_id where 1=1
and p.state = #{project.state}
and wb.member_id=#{memberId}
and Now() >= p.enroll_end_date and (p.state=1 or p.state=2)
and p.id in (select ec.project_id from evaluation_criteria ec where p.id=ec.project_id and ec.member_id=#{memberId} )
and p.id not in (select ec.project_id from evaluation_criteria ec where p.id=ec.project_id and ec.member_id=#{memberId} )
order by p.update_date desc

select * from project where state = 1 and is_audit = 1 and (Now() BETWEEN senroll_start_date AND enroll_end_date) and id not in (select p.id from review_info ri left join project p on ri.project_id = p.id where p.state = 1 and ri.state = 1 and (Now() BETWEEN p.senroll_start_date AND p.enroll_end_date) ) order by enroll_end_date asc
